privacy.title: Privacy Policy

seo.title: Privacy Policy – Trailmerge
seo.description: Trailmerge's privacy policy outlining how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
seo.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, user privacy, Trailmerge privacy

privacy.content:
Trailmerge Ltd Co. ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website. We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you fill out a contact form, subscribe to our newsletter, or communicate with us. This may include your name, email address, company name, and any other information you choose to provide. We use analytics services to understand how visitors interact with our website. We use ContentSquare, a user experience analytics platform, to help us improve our website's performance and user experience. This service may collect information about your device, browser, and how you interact with our site. We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, respond to your inquiries, send you marketing communications (with your consent), and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, subject to confidentiality agreements. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also opt-out of marketing communications at any time by contacting us or using the unsubscribe link in our emails.

GDPR Compliance (European Union)

If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We are committed to respecting these rights, which include: • The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. • The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or complete information you believe is incomplete. • The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions. • The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. • The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. • The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions. We process your personal data based on lawful grounds, including your consent, contractual necessity, legal obligations, and our legitimate business interests. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at hello@trailmerge.com.

CCPA Compliance (California)

If you are a California resident, the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) provides you with specific rights regarding your personal information: • The right to know – You have the right to request that we disclose what personal information we collect, use, disclose, and sell. • The right to delete – You have the right to request that we delete your personal information, subject to certain exceptions. • The right to opt-out – You have the right to opt-out of the sale of your personal information. Note that we do not sell your personal information. • The right to non-discrimination – We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of your CCPA rights. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at hello@trailmerge.com or call us at our business address. We will verify your identity before processing your request and respond within 45 days. If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at Trailmerge Ltd Co., 3100 Interstate North Circle SE, Suite 200, Atlanta, GA 30339, or email us at hello@trailmerge.com.

asideNew.title: Take the design-first path to the top

p1.part4: We are much more interested in
p1.part5: understanding and solving real business problems
p1.part6: than in just moving pixels, building out workflows, and writing code (though when we do these things, we do them with a special care for our craft).

p2.part1: Research and discovery aren't just checklist items for us, and Agile isn't just about timelines in our process. We are all about

project1.title: Industrial Touchscreen for Technicians
project1.description: Ground-up redesign of localized touchscreen app to better diagnose and resolve mechanical issues, for a Fortune 500 equipment manufacturer.

project2.title: Operations for Growing Enterprise
project2.description: Design & development support for a custom internal platform for a growing home and commercial services company with operations in 5 states.

project3.title: Accounting & Reporting Platform
project3.description: Strategy, design, and development for an accounting SaaS making financial reporting more accessible across multiple businesses.

seo.title: Enterprise UX Design & Custom Software Development Services – Trailmerge
seo.description: Comprehensive digital transformation services including UX research, product strategy, UI design, and custom software development for enterprise operations.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.text: Trailmerge is a full-service process consulting and custom software development firm, here for you from early discovery through delivery.

process.title: Our Process
process.description: Our methodology is based on design thinking and Agile principals, emphasizing rapid learning, deep understanding, and flexibility. We don't just create high-quality screens and workflows. We design and develop well-built, usable tools that truly solve the core problems your business is facing, because, otherwise, what's the point?

step1.title: Consulting & Kickoff
step1.description: We listen to your vision for your operational growth and provide guidance for next steps in the journey.

step2.title: Research & Discovery
step2.description: We audit your processes and/or existing systems to identify quick wins and opportunities for system-wide efficiency.

step3.title: Project Scoping
step3.description: Based on our collaborative research and strategy, we define and measure the project to determine Agile-friendly milestones.

step4.title: Implementation
step4.description: We get to work on designing and developing, using our team's unique blend of skills, best practices, and powerful technologies.

step5.title: Team Integration
step5.description: We value proactive communication and close collaboration with your internal team. It's the best way to create the best software!

step6.title: Delivery & Iteration
step6.description: We aim to deliver value continuously, so your company can start benefiting (and celebrating!) as we reach strategic milestones.

history.title: Our History
history.p1: Trailmerge was founded in 2020 by Mark Tegtmeier, a user experience (UX) design leader in Atlanta, with experience in Fortune 500 enterprise software and innovative startup contexts.
history.p2: The company initially launched as a UX design agency, and has since added software development capabilities to serve as a complete strategic partner for our clients, while retaining a problem solving, design-first ethos.
history.p3: Trailmerge now helps companies of various sizes to create efficiencies in their operations and technology through in-depth consulting, user research, digital product management, design and software development.
